snippet: The finding of a fraudulent conveyance by a court-appointed examiner means that Dynegy Holdings can sue its non-bankrupt parent company to undo the transfer.
abstract: The finding of a fraudulent conveyance by a court-appointed examiner means that Dynegy Holdings can sue its non-bankrupt parent company to undo the transfer.

headline.main: Dynegy Bankruptcy Examiner Finds Fraudulent Transfer
headline.print_headline: Examiner Rules Dynegy Asset Transfer Was Fraudulent
